Package it.unipd.dei.se.faderic.analyze

Class AnalyzerUtil

java.lang.Object
it.unipd.dei.se.faderic.analyze.AnalyzerUtil
public class AnalyzerUtil extends Object
The AnalyzerUtil class provides various utility methods for text analysis, including tokenization, loading of synonym and dictionary lists, and loading of Apache OpenNLP models.

  • Method Details

    • tokenizeString

      public static List<String> tokenizeString(org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer analyzer, String string) throws IOException
      This function takes an analyzer and a string as input, tokenizes the string using the analyzer, and returns a list of the resulting tokens.
      Parameters:
      analyzer - an instance of an Analyzer class that is used to tokenize the input string. An Analyzer is responsible for breaking down the input text into individual tokens or terms.
      string - The input string that needs to be tokenized into individual words or terms.
      Returns:
      A list of strings that are the tokens generated by the given analyzer from the input string.
      Throws:
      IOException - if something goes wrong reading the TokenStream

    • loadSynonymList

      public static org.apache.lucene.analysis.synonym.SynonymMap loadSynonymList(String synonymFile, org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer analyzer)
      This function loads a synonym list from a file and returns a SynonymMap object.
      Parameters:
      synonymFile - The name of the file containing the synonym list to be loaded.
      analyzer - The analyzer is an object that is used to analyze text and break it down into tokens. It is used in this method to parse the synonym list and build the synonym map.
      Returns:
      The method is returning a SynonymMap object.

    • loadDictionary

      public static org.apache.lucene.search.spell.PlainTextDictionary loadDictionary(String dictionaryFile)
      This function loads a plain text dictionary from a file and returns it.
      Parameters:
      dictionaryFile - A String representing the name of the file containing the dictionary to be loaded.
      Returns:
      The method is returning a PlainTextDictionary object.

    • loadStopList

      public static org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharArraySet loadStopList(String stopFile)
      Loads the required stop list among those available in the resources folder.
      Parameters:
      stopFile - the name of the file containing the stop list.
      Returns:
      the stop list
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if there is any issue while loading the stop list.

    • consumeTokenStream

      public static void consumeTokenStream(org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer a, String t) throws IOException
      Consumes a TokenStream for the given text by using the provided Analyzer and prints diagnostic information about all the generated tokens and their Attributes.
      Parameters:
      a - the analyzer to use.
      t - the text to process.
      Throws:
      IOException - if something goes wrong while processing the text.
